text:
What China wants most is to develop itself well, not to replace others. The BRI initiative aims to create more opportunities for common development.
https://t.co/cSpDGrz8Vs https://t.co/4rC6QKwaja
We have signed or reached agreement on debt suspension with 19 African countries and taken a constructive part in sustainable development programs such as the “Great Green Wall” in Africa.
China has provided Covid vaccines to over 40 African countries & the African Union, and actively supports localized production of vaccines in Africa.

The world must stand together against deliberate and dangerous acts of creating division and provoking confrontation. History and reality have made it clear, time and again, that it’s impossible to tackle common challenges in a divided world.

On 3 July, State Councilor Wang Yi delivered a keynote speech titled “Uphold World Peace and Promote Human Progress” at the Opening Ceremony of the 9th World Peace Forum.
Read the full text：
https://t.co/eXqN4qdjL5 https://t.co/IkgPI5BxoF

Stories of Zhou Enlai and Deng Xiaoping in France in the 1920s reveal the journey of the first generation of Chinese Communists that shaped the path for #China. #CPC_centenary
https://t.co/tRuT0KWpq2

Keeping people and their lives front and centre, #China has taken science-based and vigorous measures and swiftly put #Covid-19 pandemic including the #Delta virus under effective control. China is now one of the safest countries in the world.

On 3 July, #China reported 14 new #Covid cases, all of which were imported. 
The statistics say it all: That’s 14 new cases in a country of over 1.4 billion people!

In the spirit of building a community with a shared future for mankind, #China has taken continuous&concrete actions to help intl epidemic control & so far provided more than 480 mln doses of #vaccines to benefit nearly 100 countries. China is world’s largest vaccine supplier.

Amazing speed! Over 1.296 bln doses of Covid #vaccines have been administered in #China.
China stands ready to work even more closely with other countries to win this battle against the pandemic. https://t.co/0jqu29YDUl

With the first centenary goal realized, the #CPC will unite & lead Chinese people to achieve the second centenary goal and build China into a great modern socialist country. 
Click to read the full text of the speech by General Secretary Xi Jinping. #CPC_centenary. https://t.co/El0P4oUpnf
This is the most magnificent chapter in the millennia-long history of the Chinese nation that every CPC member and every Chinese citizen should be proud of.

Congratulations on the #centenary of the Communist Party of China!
Since 1921, the #CPC has united and led the Chinese nation in a century of strenuous struggles, achieving the tremendous transformation from standing up and growing prosperous to becoming strong. https://t.co/CtVsa5sDWk

At the rally in Beijing to mark #CPC centenary, President Xi Jinping announced that China has achieved the goal of building a moderate prosperous society in all respects & eliminated absolute poverty. This is a historic moment for the Chinese nation & the Communist Party of China https://t.co/PjDkoqD0Z1

Secret to the success of the #CPC:
Plan+Efficient+Open+Pragmatic+Leadership+Evolving = PEOPLE #CPC_centenary
https://t.co/tM08a9ylPV
Great news! 186 Chinese #supercomputers made to the newly released list of Top500 supercomputer. #China continues to lead in the number of supercomputer installations. https://t.co/742uXDiP1o

The #CPC membership has been growing and now reaches over 95 million. Staying true to its original aspiration, the CPC has always put the people front and centre and served the people heart and soul. (Picture/Xinhua) https://t.co/CvDB43xIkz

Great news! After 70 years of arduous efforts, #China has now completely eliminated #malaria. We stand ready to share experience and contribute more to a malaria-free world.
https://t.co/DV437UGRSf

Language was a vehicle of civilization and a bridge of communication. I expressed three hopes for students and enthusiasts of the Chinese language. Click to read: 
https://t.co/JW0r3D7tB7 https://t.co/wv7aJl1xjo
https://t.co/K8k4ZXhcMW
https://t.co/CvyZTBm68e
https://t.co/OJpL49yJNY
China has the largest expressway network in the world. Join a journey of 1,966 kilometres along Shanghai-Chengdu expressway and know more about China's auto industry. https://t.co/5SUJYImMtz

So much embedded in the design and cast of the July 1 Medal, the highest honour of the #CPC.
Watch this revealing video.
https://t.co/pVnWLNZRR6

The recipients of the July 1 Medal deserve high tribute from all of us. They embody the great spirit of the #CPC which is dedicated to serving the Chinese people heart and soul.
https://t.co/48n19QYzEG

A real delight to announce the release of online exhibition of achievements of Chinese enterprises in UK. Hope business communities of the two countries will step up their practical cooperation. 
Read my speech at the event. 
https://t.co/sNjWodDE5r https://t.co/zuaTEEhq9j

Amazing videos and pictures captured by China's first #Mars probe #Tianwen1 during its landing and roving exploration on the red planet.
These are the first published videos of the rover's movement on Mars.
https://t.co/dCXxENRhXj

A new hub to connect China and the world!
Click to find out more about the Chengdu Tianfu International Airport opened yesterday.
https://t.co/8feJBMtLF5

Read my speech.
https://t.co/9GZQbYPXNX

Very glad to join Consul-General Zheng Xiyuan&General Secretary Robert Griffiths at event celebrating 100th anniversary of founding of Communist Party of China co-hosted by Chinese Consulate General in Manchester and Communist Party of Britain @CPBritain. Happy birthday CPC! https://t.co/eHtWQOm95O
RT @ChineseEmbinUK: The 20th Chinese Bridge UK Regional Final was successfully held online this morning. Ambassador Zheng Zeguang, Interim…

My salute to teachers and volunteers who have worked hard to introduce Chinese language and culture to UK students, and also to British friends in all sectors for their valuable support. https://t.co/Wsu8xzNSlc

Delighted to attend the 20th Chinese Bridge UK Regional Final and watch British university students display their Chinese language skills & talents. Mastery of the language provides a golden key to exploring China & its civilisation. 
https://t.co/VgJKQqe1oD https://t.co/bFMGwaUc6O
Visited the grave of Karl Marx and paid our high respects, as we are celebrating the centenary of the Communist Party of China. https://t.co/PbP4eI8gz0

Despite #Covid19, the BRI cooperation does not come to a halt, but braves the headwinds and continues to move forward. BRI has becomes the world's broadest-based and largest platform for international cooperation.
The Asia-Pacific Region should be a pacesetter of development and cooperation, not a chessboard for geopolitics. The #BRI is a public road open to all, and has no backyard or high walls.

State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi gave a keynote speech at Asia and Pacific High-level Conference on Belt and Road Cooperation.
Read the speech: https://t.co/FpL4hga0UV https://t.co/K3MqH0klLP

Exploring space is the shared dream of mankind. We look forward to deeper and wider cooperation with the rest of the world.
https://t.co/7NCejAjcA5

China has eliminated over 280,000 tons of ozone-depleting substances, accounting for more than half of the total amount eliminated by developing countries. We will continue to earnestly implement the Montreal Protocol and advance global climate and environmental governance. https://t.co/CGRUYOVmN8

On 22 June, I delivered a keynote speech at the Embassy Symposium on the Centenary of the Founding of the Communist Party of China. 
Read my speech.
https://t.co/yH9yQrfOgi https://t.co/Uu8NDDHnqJ

A magnificent way to mark the centenary of the founding of the Communist Party of China.
https://t.co/jqbrXIoYXF

As of June 19, over 1 bln doses of COVID-19 #vaccines had been administered in China. We are pushing ahead with the largest vaccination drive in the history of New China.
https://t.co/OCaGcDP69o

In the first 5 months of this year, China invested $7.43 bln in #BRI countries, up 13.8 % y-o-y to. China will continue to work with other parties for high-quality BRI cooperation. https://t.co/zWZez2Q62e

Glad to have met online with @ChinaBritain CBBC President Lord Sassoon & Chairman Sir Sherard. We had a good discussion on building closer economic&trade links between China&UK. Look forward to working with CBBC and the business community in UK. https://t.co/dJsejZQZFT

Glad to have met online with Mr Stephen Perry, Chairman of the 48 Group Club @the48groupclub, an old friend of China. I appreciate the efforts and spirit of Icebreakers and look forward to working closely with the 48 Group Club. https://t.co/qj6dtBcSgy

China is working on further shortening the negative list for foreign investment. This will mean more opportunities for investors, particularly in service, high-tech & advanced manufacturing sectors, & a fairer, more transparent & predictable business environment. https://t.co/okFaUS36Ly

Wonderful news! The Shenzhou-12 has been successfully launched and three astronauts are now in China’s space station. This is another major step forward enabling China to make more contribution to space exploration of mankind. https://t.co/iIjNeDWfqb

Delighted to present copy of my Letter of Credence to Ms. Victoria Busby, Director of Protocol & Vice-Marshal of Diplomatic Corps. We had a good conversation. Look forward to working with friends in all sectors to enhance understanding & cooperation between China & UK.
今天，我很高兴向英国外交部礼宾司司长、使团副典礼官巴斯比女士递交国书副本。我们进行了很好的交谈。我期待与英国各界朋友一道努力，促进中英两国相互了解与互利合作。
